verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on xaroba$-v

frameset.edef: to scribble or scrawl, to scratch

example.parse: (TOP (NP (NP (X (CONJ وَ) (RESTRIC_PART إِلّا)) (DET+NOUN الوَلَد)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الِّي)) (S (VP (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV3MS+IV يِخربش) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (DET+NOUN الشُبّاك))))))))
